body_html:
You'd need to inherit from the private underlying implementation types, RefVariable (deprecated) or ResourceVariable.

If you describe your use-case for inheriting from Variable we can discuss how best to accomplish it.

body:
You'd need to inherit from the private underlying implementation types, RefVariable (deprecated) or ResourceVariable.

If you describe your use-case for inheriting from Variable we can discuss how best to accomplish it.
